resources:
SunkIt Home Dashboard Notifications SunkIt! Add Player DIE UP! LEADERBOARDS how to play A Beginners Guide to The Sport of Beer Die 2. Two teams of two compete. 3. Each player places a cup filled with a drink (beer for 21+) in their corner of the table. 4. Each team rolls one die and the highest number opens the game. 1. Die is a formal game to be played with respect. 5. One at a time, players throw thier die up in the air to at least a suitable height determined before play commences. 6. The die thrown must hit the table beyond the midline. 7. The defending team must catch the die after it bounces off the table with just one hand before it hits the ground. 8. Players score if the opposing team fails to catch the die. 1 point for hitting just the table, 2 points for hitting a cup, 3 points for sinking the die in the cup. 9. Games are won by scoring 11 points and having a lead of at least 2 points. Return Home Place holder for leaderboard Place Holder for adding players DYE UP! place holder for main game
9. Games are won once one team reaches 12 points and having a lead of at least 2 points. In the event of a high scoring game (such as 12-11) the game ends once a team secures a 2 point lead. ======= Enter the name of a new player Save New Player Add the name of a new player Add win Global Bar Graph Global Pie Chart >>>>>>> Stashed changes
